site-recommendations.description: The growth of a human and working group is directly connected to the elements within. Antonio is certainly an added value in this growth. Always available and attentive to the company's priorities and needs, constantly growing personaly and professionaly by documenting the latest technologies and innovations in the computing sector. Definitely recommended.

In the course of business activities Antonio has always been proactive in learning new knowledge and available in participation in events, courses and training workshops. For its seriousness and commitment, Antonio is an ideal professional for the development and execution of complex projects, having excellent time management capabilities
